Added several console commands to Vol.1 against original, added font color and some other text attributes to comfortable reading.

[b]Mod saved in CK now. Hopefully, bugs fixed.[/b]
[i]There IS unknown mod (maybe, several), which conflicted with this.
I think, a mod, which changes a merchant sale lists or conflicted by book ID\'s and connected AFTER this mod in order. I don\'t know exactly which - check your mods. If somebody reports such mod, I\'ll place a report about conflicting mods here. Please, write me a PM about this.[/i]

Description
===========
This mod adds two lore-friendly books containing a list of known console commands, perk IDs and shout/word codes (volume 1) and a list of player.additem codes (volume 2).

These books do NOT replace any existing books and can be purchased from Belethor in Whiterun. Or, if you want, you can download the previous version instead and use the additem command to give yourself the books (see the readme included for details).

Russian readme uploaded and included to archive as well.
The readme uploaded in russian. Please, click the Readme area and the link \"View as a .txt\" on the right.
author: NordicMist Shadowmann
